short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oh, looky there, what is that? It's text... And it blinks. It's blinking text! Hooray!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds support for the non-standard "blink" HTML tag. Most text inside the "blink" tag should blink, like in the Netscape browser, and old versions of Firefox.
